name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.

name: Fettuccine Alfredo
description: Creamy Alfredo sauce tossed with fettuccine pasta and garnished with parsley.

name: Penne Arrabiata
description: Spicy tomato sauce combined with penne pasta and topped with fresh basil.

name: Lasagna Bolognese
description: Layers of pasta sheets, Bolognese sauce, b√©chamel, and melted cheese.

description: Homemade ravioli filled with ricotta cheese and spinach served with marinara sauce.

name: Pasta Primavera
description: Colorful pasta dish featuring assorted vegetables and a light garlic sauce.

name: Gnocchi Sorrentina
description: Soft potato dumplings baked with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and basil.

name: Linguine alle Vongole
description: Linguine pasta served with fresh clams, garlic, white wine, and parsley.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Italian pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: Traditional pizza with pepperoni slices and melted mozzarella cheese on top.

name: Vegetarian Pizza
description: Delicious pizza loaded with assorted vegetables and gooey cheese on a crispy crust.

name: Hawaiian Pizza
description: A tropical twist on pizza with ham, pineapple, and mozzarella cheese.

name: Tiramisu
description: A classic Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers, mascarpone cheese, and cocoa powder.

name: Cannoli
description: Crispy pastry shells filled with sweet ricotta cheese, chocolate chips, and a hint of citrus zest.

name: Gelato Affogato
description: Creamy Italian gelato drowned in a shot of hot espresso, creating a delightful blend of cold and hot flavors.

name: Panna Cotta
description: Silky smooth vanilla-flavored cream pudding topped with a tangy berry compote.

name: Zeppole
description: Light and airy Italian doughnuts dusted with powdered sugar, served warm with a side of chocolate dipping sauce.

name: Classic Mojito
description: A refreshing blend of white rum, fresh mint leaves, lime juice, sugar, and soda water.

name: Margarita
description: A classic Mexican cocktail made with tequila, lime juice, and triple sec, served with a salted rim.

name: Espresso Martini
description: A sophisticated cocktail blending vodka, coffee liqueur, freshly brewed espresso, and a touch of sugar syrup.

name: Gin and Tonic
description: A classic highball cocktail made with gin, tonic water, and a slice of lime, served over ice.

name: Whiskey Sour
description: A tangy cocktail made with whiskey, lemon juice, sugar, and optionally a dash of egg white for a frothy texture.

name: Pina Colada
description: A tropical cocktail made with rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice, served blended with ice.

name: Virgin Mojito
description: A non-alcoholic version of the classic mojito, made with fresh mint leaves, lime juice, sugar, and soda water.

name: Berry Blast Smoothie
description: A refreshing smoothie packed with mixed berries, banana, yogurt, and a splash of orange juice.
